question: The government of Maharashtra increased the financial aid to the family of Martyred Jawans who belongs to Maharashtra to which amount?
explanation: The government of Maharashtra increased the financial aid to the family of Martyred Jawans who belongs to Maharashtra to Rs. 1 Crore. Rs 60lakh to soldiers with a disability of 51 to 100%. Rs20 lakh for 25% disability and Rs 34lakh for disability up to 50%.
